content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'logdata' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'dbo')
CREATE TABLE dbo.logdata
	(
	 [C1] nvarchar(4000),
	 [C2] nvarchar(4000),
	 [C3] nvarchar(4000),
	 [C4] nvarchar(4000),
	 [C5] nvarchar(4000),
	 [C6] nvarchar(4000),
	 [C7] nvarchar(4000),
	 [C8] nvarchar(4000),
	 [C9] nvarchar(4000),
	 [C10] nvarchar(4000),
	 [C11] nvarchar(4000)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_logdata
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO dbo.logdata
(C1 1, C2 2, C3 3, C4 4, C5 5, C6 6, C7 7, C8 8, C9 9, C10 10, C11 11)
FROM 'https://pedokexternalstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/data/Log.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://pedokexternalstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/data/'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.logdata
GO
